nodes.text: A Vendor droid was present on a Weequay pirate ship, the Marauder, during the events of the Clone Wars around 21 BBY. This droid was used for entertainment as a gladiator droid and fought ASP-series labor droid K0-5D.
K0-5D destroyed this droid with relative ease and used his built-in flamethrower to set fire to his remains.
